Today, I chaired a meeting of the Council of Ministers at the Presidential Palace in Abu Dhabi, during which we adopted the general budget of the Federation for the year 2015 at a value of 49 billion dirhams
The budget of the Union 2015 is balanced in terms of its expenditures and revenues, and we allocated 49% of them to social development projects and social benefits of citizens
AED 20 billion is allocated for government affairs and service development, and our budget is consistent with our plans and our stringent government financial standards
We also adopted today a new composition of the Board of Directors of the General Authority for Youth and Sports .. All the best for the new Council under the chairmanship of Sheikh Nahyan bin Mubarak
We also adopted today the Executive Regulations of the Competition Regulation Law in the State, concerning the organization of economic activities and intellectual property rights in the State
The Republic of Turkey will not bow to three or five street buggers. We do not bow to burning, burning, we do not bow to disturbance.
Today I changed a cabinet meeting during which we approved the General Federal Budget for 2015 at AED 49 billion.
The budget is balanced: expenditure equals income. It funds all of our plans for government according to strict financial standards.
Social development and benefits account for 49% of spending. Government services will receive AED 20 billion.
We also adopted executive regulations for the law on economic competition and intellectual property.

Today, I am delighted to visit GITEX Dubai, a scientific and global gathering of 3,700 participants from more than 70 countries. Knowledge and technology today became the first tool for development.
The presence of more than 120 government entities at GITEX reflects a major shift in government thinking in the delivery of services and a clear willingness to use technology to serve people

A while ago, we launched the smart government and the smart city. Today we see results. Because change always begins with an idea, vision and faith followed by implementation, sincerity and dedication.
